emissions.closest_match_explanation: The ingredient '1 kg of minced beef' is an exact match to 'beef, mince, 5-10% fat, raw' and 'beef, mince, 10-15% fat, raw'. According to rule 5, if multiple viable options have similar processing levels, the one with the highest emission factor should be chosen. 'beef, mince, 5-10% fat, raw' has a higher emission factor (50.6 kg CO2e / kg) than 'beef, mince, 10-15% fat, raw' (48.0 kg CO2e / kg).
